change.item: Edited by Heather Mulliner to reflect updated administrative information

did.unittitle: Coalition for Education in District 1 Records (Community School District 1 (New York, N.Y.)

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: The Coalition for Education in District 1 (Lower East Side, New York, N.Y.) was an organization of parents and teachers in the district concerned with various education and school employment issues in the district. The collection contains correspondence, flyers, newsletters, and other documents produced by the Coalition particularly in reference to school board elections, parents associations, racial issues, and boycotts. There are some photographs. The Coalition opposed the slates of candidates endorsed by the United Federation of Teachers, and many of their policies and political positions. Material is in several languages including English, Spanish, and Chinese.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Coalition for Education in District 1 (Community School District 1 (New York, N.Y.).

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Coalition for Education in District 1 (Lower East Side, New York, N.Y.) was an organization of parents and teachers in the district concerned with various education and school employment issues in the district.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains correspondence, flyers, newsletters, and other documents produced by the Coalition particularly in reference to school board elections, parents associations, racial issues, and boycotts. There are some photographs. The Coalition opposed the slates of candidates endorsed by the United Federation of Teachers, and many of their policies and political positions. Material is in several languages including English, Spanish, and Chinese.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Tamiment Library received a donation of the records of the Coalition for Education in District 1; the date of this donation is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1980.025.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain beginning in 2090. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.
